name: BDO/Brussels Worldwide Services BVBA
legal: Belgian limited liability company (i.e. BVBA), the entity coordinating service provision within the international BDO network
goal: To organise, support, coordinate and represent the Member Firms of the BDO international network of audit and accounting firms and to represent their interests to policy makers.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Competition, Economy, finance and the euro, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: EU audit legislation, legislation in the area of accounting, corporate governance, taxation, Capital Markets Union and other issues impacting the BDO Member Firms.
